price: Anawaahidi na anawatia tamaa. Na Shet'ani hawaahidi ila udanganyifu.
arabic: يَعِدُهُمۡ وَيُمَنِّيهِمۡۖ وَمَا يَعِدُهُمُ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ إِلَّا غُرُورًا
footnotes: Shetani huwapambia shari, wakaiona nzuri, na huwaahidi manufaa watayo pata pindi wakitenda kitendo fulani, na huwatia katika nafsi zao matumaini ya kuyatumai. Na hapana lolote analo waahidi na analo wapambia ila ni udanganyifu mtupu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: yaʿiduhum wayumannīhim wamā yaʿiduhumu al-shayṭānu illā ghurūran
